mapper.update: update jackpot set stockNum = stockNum + ${removeNum} where id = #{id} and stockNum + ${removeNum} >=0
mapper.select: select id,prizeName,getProbabi,stockNum,prizeImg,marketPrice from jackpot where status = 1 and stockNum > 0 order by id asc
select id,prizeName,getProbabi,stockNum,marketPrice,prizeImg,status, DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') createTime, DATE_FORMAT(updateTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') updateTime from jackpot
